dcterms:creator: M. Sarhan
S. Layeghy
N. Moustafa
M. Portmann
dcterms:description: A dataset containing NetFlow data for machine learning-based network intrusion detection systems, focusing on various types of attacks and benign traffic.
dcterms:title: NF-Bot-IoT

dcterms:creator: M. Sarhan
S. Layeghy
M. Portmann
dcterms:description: An updated version of the NF-Bot-IoT dataset, expanding the number of features and the volume of network flows, aimed at improving the detection of various attack types.
dcterms:title: NF-Bot-IoT-v2

dcterms:creator: M. Sarhan
S. Layeghy
N. Moustafa
M. Portmann
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from the CSE-CIC-IDS2018, containing NetFlow data for network intrusion detection, focusing on various attack types and benign traffic.
dcterms:title: NF-CSE-CIC-IDS2018

dcterms:creator: M. Sarhan
S. Layeghy
M. Portmann
dcterms:description: An enhanced version of the NF-CSE-CIC-IDS2018 dataset, expanding the number of features and the volume of network flows, aimed at improving the detection of various attack types.
dcterms:title: NF-CSE-CIC-IDS2018-v2
